services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of garden and landscaping services to meet all your outdoor needs.

lawnCare.title: Lawn Care & Maintenance
lawnCare.description: Regular mowing, fertilizing, aeration, and weed control to keep your lawn healthy and vibrant all year round.

gardenDesign.title: Garden Design
gardenDesign.description: Custom garden designs that reflect your style and meet your needs, from modern minimalist to lush traditional.

planting.title: Planting Services
planting.description: Expert selection and installation of trees, shrubs, flowers, and other plants suitable for your local climate and soil conditions.

irrigation.title: Irrigation Systems
irrigation.description: Planning and installation of efficient irrigation systems to ensure your garden is optimally watered with minimal water usage.

landscaping.title: Landscaping
landscaping.description: Creation of patios, walkways, retaining walls, and other structural elements that complement your landscape design.

seasonalCleaning.title: Seasonal Cleaning
seasonalCleaning.description: Thorough spring and fall cleanup to prepare your garden for the growing season or winter months.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear what our satisfied customers have to say about our services.

items.text: "Cristian transformed our backyard from a barren wasteland into a lush paradise. His attention to detail and knowledge of plants is impressive! We couldn't be happier with the results."

items.text: "We've tried several gardeners before, but none compare to Christian's expertise. Our lawn has never looked better! His team is professional, punctual, and truly cares about the work they do."

items.text: "Professional, punctual, and passionate about his work. Cristian doesn't just do the job, he creates art with nature. Our garden has become the envy of the neighborhood."
